ComicInfo.Summary:
Things go from bad to worse for Robyn. Not only is she trapped in a maximum security prison with her deadliest enemies but the Warden has passed his own sentence on her...and his verdict is death.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Edgar Salazar & Ivan Nunes | 1 | B | Cover B | Ediano Silva & Grostieta | 2 | C | Cover C | Alfredo Reyes & Ceci de la Cruz | 3 | D | Cover D | Netho Diaz, Thiago Gomes & Jorge Cortes | 4 | E | Toronto Fan Expo Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 250 | Dawn McTeigue | Missing | F | Toronto Fan Expo Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 150 | Dawn McTeigue | Missing | G | Cosplay Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 350 | David Nakayama | Missing | H | Baltimore Comic Con Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 350 | Jamie Tyndall (a) & Ula Mos (c) | Missing |
